tagline.english: Latex & Nitrile Options for Maximum Protection and Comfort
tagline.vietnamese: Lựa Chọn Latex & Nitrile Cho Bảo Vệ Và Thoải Mái Tối Đa

overview.english: Professional-grade protective gloves available in two material options: Latex Protect+ (natural latex, white) and Nitrile (synthetic, black). Both are powder-free, offer excellent chemical resistance, and provide the flexibility and comfort needed for extended salon work. UKCA certified for professional safety standards.
overview.vietnamese: Găng tay bảo vệ cấp chuyên nghiệp có sẵn trong hai lựa chọn vật liệu: Latex Protect+ (latex tự nhiên, trắng) và Nitrile (tổng hợp, đen). Cả hai không bột, cung cấp khả năng chống hóa chất xuất sắc, và cung cấp tính linh hoạt và thoải mái cần thiết cho công việc salon kéo dài. Được chứng nhận UKCA theo tiêu chuẩn an toàn chuyên nghiệp.

targetAudience.primary: Professional nail technicians and salon workers

uniqueSelling: Two material options to accommodate all needs and allergies
Both materials are powder-free for reduced irritation
Strong chemical resistance to acetone, monomer, and cleaning solutions
UKCA PPE Category I certification for professional standards
Available in S, M, L sizes

description.english: Premium natural latex gloves with excellent elasticity and durability. Ideal for salons with no latex-allergic clients. Provides comfortable fit even during extended hours of work.
description.vietnamese: Găng tay latex tự nhiên cao cấp với độ co giãn và độ bền xuất sắc. Lý tưởng cho salon không có khách hàng dị ứng latex. Cung cấp vừa vặn thoải mái ngay cả trong các giờ làm việc kéo dài.

variants.name: Nitrile

description.english: High-performance synthetic nitrile gloves with superior durability and chemical resistance. Ideal for salons with latex-allergic clients or team members. Professional appearance with reduced visible staining.
description.vietnamese: Găng tay nitrile tổng hợp hiệu suất cao với độ bền vượt trội và khả năng chống hóa chất. Lý tưởng cho salon có khách hàng hoặc nhân viên dị ứng latex. Giao diện chuyên nghiệp với giảm bị dính bẩn nhìn thấy.

variants.color_characteristics: Professional black, hides stains and soiling

specifications.packaging: 100 pieces per box; 10 boxes per case (1000 pieces)
specifications.chemical_resistance: Excellent against acetone, monomer, brush cleaner, and salon chemicals
specifications.comfort: Comfortable for extended wear and frequent changes

features: Powder-free formula reduces irritation and allergy risk
Chemical resistant to acetone, monomer, and cleaning solutions
Excellent flexibility for precise nail work
Durable construction prevents tearing and puncture
UKCA certified Professional Personal Protective Equipment
Available in multiple sizes for proper fit
Quick and easy to put on and remove
Two material options accommodate all allergies and preferences
benefits: Full hand protection during chemical exposure
Reduced risk of allergic reactions with two material options
Latex-free option (Nitrile) available for sensitive teams
Professional appearance suitable for client-facing work
Comfort enables longer wear without hand fatigue
Chemical resistance prevents damage to skin from harsh products
Cost-effective bulk packaging for high-volume salons
Easy size selection ensures proper fit for all technicians

safety: PPE Category I (Low-risk personal protective equipment)
Suitable for contact with acetone, monomer, and salon chemicals
Not suitable for people with latex allergies (use Nitrile variant)
Use alongside other PPE for comprehensive protection

care_and_storage.storage: Keep in cool, dry location away from direct sunlight
care_and_storage.shelf_life: Maintain quality in original sealed packaging

sizes.description: For smaller hands; comfortable fit without excess material
For larger hands; maintains flexibility and comfort

pricing_structure.case: per case (10 boxes, all same size or mixed)

commercial.availability: Available through VLDirect and authorized BlazingStar distributors

best_for: Professional nail technicians requiring daily hand protection
Salons without latex-allergic clients (Latex Protect+ option)
Salons with latex-allergic clients or staff (Nitrile option)
High-volume salons requiring bulk glove quantities
Technicians performing acrylic and gel services

technique.name: Selecting Material
technique.english: Choose Latex Protect+ for high elasticity and comfort if no allergy concerns. Choose Nitrile if any technician or regular client has latex allergy. Nitrile offers excellent protection without allergy risk.
technique.vietnamese: Chọn Latex Protect+ để có độ co giãn cao và thoải mái nếu không có mối lo ngại dị ứng. Chọn Nitrile nếu bất kỳ thợ hoặc khách hàng thường xuyên có dị ứng latex. Nitrile cung cấp bảo vệ xuất sắc mà không có nguy cơ dị ứng.

technique.name: Proper Fit
technique.english: Select appropriate size (S, M, L) for comfortable fit. Too-small gloves restrict movement; too-large gloves reduce tactile sensitivity. Proper fit is essential for precision work.
technique.vietnamese: Chọn kích thước thích hợp (S, M, L) để vừa vặn thoải mái. Găng tay quá nhỏ hạn chế chuyển động; găng tay quá lớn giảm độ nhạy cảm xúc. Vừa vặn đúng là cần thiết cho công việc chính xác.

technique.name: Frequency of Change
technique.english: Change gloves between clients to prevent cross-contamination. Some technicians prefer to change gloves every few clients for maximum hygiene.
technique.vietnamese: Thay đổi găng tay giữa các khách hàng để ngăn ngừa nhiễm chéo. Một số thợ thích thay đổi găng tay cứ sau vài khách để vệ sinh tối đa.

care_instructions.before_use: Remove gloves from box and let adjust to room temperature
care_instructions.during_use: Change gloves when visibly soiled or per salon hygiene protocols
care_instructions.removal: Pinch outer side and peel off; discard in appropriate waste
care_instructions.hand_care: Apply moisturizing lotion after frequent glove use

tips: Stock both Latex and Nitrile—helps accommodate all clients and staff allergies
Bulk case purchase is more cost-effective for high-volume salons
Keep multiple size options on hand for team member comfort
Change gloves between clients to maintain hygiene standards
Nitrile black color hides soiling better than white latex
Latex Protect+ offers superior comfort for all-day wear if no allergies present
Store gloves away from heat and direct sunlight for longer shelf life
